alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 8:53AM CST until February 08 at 6:36AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Flooding is expected on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 80.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 94.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
